title: Vibration API
body: This specification defines an API that provides access to the vibration mechanism of the hosting device. Vibration is a form of tactile feedback.

comments.body: On desktops, the vibration could be passed into a mouse if it has a force feedback feature built in.
Not only easy, but by implementing this relatively easy API, you'll take us mobile app developers one step closer to not having to write platform specific apps
This seems like an easy API to implement yet would make cross-browser/cross-device compatibility much easier.
